CmdLine: apt-get update  -y &&     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends git &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&     mkdir -p $GOPATH/bin  $GOSRC/github.com/bayugyug &&     cd $GOSRC/github.com/bayugyug &&     git clone https://github.com/bayugyug/gohttpdummy.git &&     cd $GOSRC/github.com/bayugyug/gohttpdummy &&     go get -v && go build -tags netgo -installsuffix netgo -installsuffix cgo -v -ldflags "-s -w -X main.pBuildTime=`date -u +%Y%m%d.%H%M%S`" . &&     cd $GOSRC && go install github.com/bayugyug/gohttpdummy &&     cd $GOSRC/github.com/bayugyug/gohttpdummy &&     cp -f Docker/cleanup.sh $GOPATH/bin/ &&     chmod +x $GOPATH/bin/* &&     $GOPATH/bin/cleanup.sh
Commands.Name: run
